description: Cortus Energy AB engages in the provision of renewable energy gas solutions for power, industrial, and transport applications. The company is headquartered in Kista, Stockholm and currently employs 30 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2004-12-10. The firm uses a WoodRoll biomass gasification technology to produce Synthesis Gas (Syngas), which replaces fossil fuels. To the process industry, the Company offers high heat and high temperature fuel. To the power industry, the Company offers electricity via burning of energy gas using combustion engines, as well as harnessed exhaust heat for district heating systems. To the transport sector, it offers transportation fuels and downstream applications. To the waste management industry it offers transformation of waste into energy gas. The firm works in partnership with such companies, as AF, Calderys and Kanthal, among others.
name: Cortus Energy AB
